author: USA TODAY
title: Mike D'Antoni delivers 'alternative facts' joke
text:
Mike D'Antoni delivers 'alternative facts' joke More jokes about Kellyanne Conway's quote. Post to Facebook Mike D'Antoni delivers 'alternative facts' joke More jokes about Kellyanne Conway's quote.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/01/houston-rockets-mike-dantoni-alternative-facts-donald-trump-kellyanne-conway-quote/   Mike D'Antoni delivers 'alternative facts' joke Charles Curtis , USA TODAY 9:25 a.m. ET Jan. 26, 2017 3 Shares 
Houston Rockets head coach Mike D'Antoni smiles during the second half of an NBA basketball game against the Memphis Grizzlies Saturday, Jan. 21, 2017, in Memphis, Tenn. (AP Photo/Brandon Dill) ORG XMIT: TNBD114 (Photo: AP) 
Thanks to Houston Rockets head coach Mike D'Antoni, Kellyanne Conway's "alternative facts" phrase continues to makes its way through the sports world. 
After San Antonio Spurs' Gregg Popovich and Tennessee's basketball media guide used it , here's what D'Antoni said before Wednesday's game against the Boston Celtics: D'Antoni, asked about Rockets going 3-5 past few weeks: "Actually we won all those games. I'm going with that alternative fact thing." â€” Jonathan Feigen (@Jonathan_Feigen) January 25, 2017 
Can we officially call this a meme now if it isn't already? Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/01/houston-rockets-mike-dantoni-alternative-facts-donald-trump-kellyanne-conway-quote/ Most Popular
